Repeat: insert right needle under running thread between 1st and 2nd stitch on left needle and draw up a loop loosely; then insert right needle between these same stitches above the running thread and draw through another loop loosely; then bring yarn to front between needles and purl the 1st stitch on left needle; then with point of left needle pass the first loop over the 2nd loop and the purled stitch and off the needle; then pass the 2nd loop over the purled stitch and off the needle; k5
